text:
@realDonaldTrump @PressSec MAGA: 3+ yrs
*Impeached slimeball
*The federal budget deficit is projected to be $3.7 trillion. Federal debt held by the public is projected to be 101% of GDP by end of fiscal year.
*Called covid-19 a Dem hoax 
*Created a culture of lies
* Calls their Racism Patriotism
